item.title: configuring a LAMP server on CentOS 6
item.description: In this first post I’ll explain how I configurated my VPS to run a basic LAMP server with multiple php versions, compiled by myself. You can get your own cheap VPS (~3â‚¬) and test a lot of things. Firstly, we’ll create our dir structure. I’ll use jag.co as a domain for this example, you can choose the dir structure you want, but I recommend following this one: / /var/www/vhosts/jag.co /var/www/vhosts/jag.
